org.jmu.multiinfo.service.basestatistics.impl

类 NaturalRanking

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jmu.multiinfo.service.basestatistics.impl.NaturalRanking
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.apache.commons.math3.stat.ranking.RankingAlgorithm

    public class NaturalRanking
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.commons.math3.stat.ranking.RankingAlgorithm

    Ranking based on the natural ordering on doubles.

    NaNs are treated according to the configured NaNStrategy and ties are handled using the selected TiesStrategy. Configuration settings are supplied in optional constructor arguments. Defaults are NaNStrategy.FAILED and TiesStrategy.AVERAGE, respectively. When using TiesStrategy.RANDOM, a RandomGenerator may be supplied as a constructor argument.

    Examples:

    Input data: (20, 17, 30, 42.3, 17, 50, Double.NaN, Double.NEGATIVE_INFINITY, 17)
    NaNStrategyTiesStrategy rank(data)
    default (NaNs maximal) default (ties averaged) (5,7,4,3,7,2,1,9,7)
    default (NaNs maximal) MINIMUM (5,6,4,3,6,2,1,9,6)
    MINIMAL default (ties averaged) (4,6,3,2,6,1,8.5,8.5,6)
    REMOVED SEQUENTIAL (4,5,3,2,6,1,8,7)
    MINIMAL MAXIMUM (4,7,3,2,7,1,9,9,7)

    从以下版本开始:
    2.0

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      NaturalRanking()
      Create a NaturalRanking with default strategies for handling ties and NaNs.

      Create a NaturalRanking with the given NaNStrategy.
      NaturalRanking(org.apache.commons.math3.stat.ranking.NaNStrategy nanStrategy, org.apache.commons.math3.random.RandomGenerator randomGenerator)
      Create a NaturalRanking with the given NaNStrategy, TiesStrategy.RANDOM and the given source of random data.
      NaturalRanking(org.apache.commons.math3.stat.ranking.NaNStrategy nanStrategy, org.apache.commons.math3.stat.ranking.TiesStrategy tiesStrategy)
      Create a NaturalRanking with the given NaNStrategy and TiesStrategy.
      NaturalRanking(org.apache.commons.math3.random.RandomGenerator randomGenerator)
      Create a NaturalRanking with TiesStrategy.RANDOM and the given RandomGenerator as the source of random data.
      NaturalRanking(org.apache.commons.math3.stat.ranking.TiesStrategy tiesStrategy)
      Create a NaturalRanking with the given TiesStrategy.

      • rank

        public double[] rank(double[] data)
        Rank data using the natural ordering on Doubles, with NaN values handled according to nanStrategy and ties resolved using tiesStrategy.
        指定者:
        rank 在接口中 org.apache.commons.math3.stat.ranking.RankingAlgorithm
        参数:
        data - array to be ranked
        返回:
        array of ranks
        抛出:
        org.apache.commons.math3.exception.NotANumberException - if the selected NaNStrategy is FAILED and a Double.NaN is encountered in the input data
